Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
06.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
01.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (CLHS)
14.08.2012 SH SCR17511 Changed font 129 to 211 for control to display the remarks

21.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ001 by the BMQ005
-- Shortcut labels
-- OMQ198B uses OMQ198A permissions, see PI.ACL(OMQ198A)
-- Shortcut handling (Using also OMQ198A button lables, OMQ198B is
not registered in table PROG)
-- Reset ouptput parameters
-- Button Not OK
-- Button OK
-- Only values <= CLHS_LIMITNEW are allowed
.. reset value
-- Only values >=date() and <= CLHS_DATVALID are allowed
.. reset value
-- Validations (only if button OK is pressed)
-- Only values <= CLHS_LIMITNEW are allowed
-- Only values >=date() and <= CLHS_DATVALID are allowed
-- CLHS_TEXT must be entered
... recalcualte percentage and get allowed limit again (perhaps v.EXPIRY is
changed)
-- Finance limit competence exceeded
-- Users have to confirm to continue with the new limit /expiry date
... replace CR/LF by blank, otherwise they are displayed in OMQ008
... user confirmed to continue wih the new limit / expiry date, go on to store
data
... replace CR/LF by blank, otherwise they are displayed in OMQ008
... user didn't confirmed to continue wih the new limit / expiry date, leave
program
... give message that 1 other approval is required
... Sort descending to fetch LDHI with highest date/time
... add two blank lines and user name / date / time
... add V.REMARKS after one blank line
... Sort descending to fetch LDHI with highest date/time
